publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8070 Jamie Hepburn: Croy Railway Station—That the Parliament welcomes the official opening of the new park-and-ride facility at Croy railway station by the Minister for Transport and Infrastructure, Keith Brown, on Wednesday 23 February 2011; acknowledges that the facility is the biggest of its kind in Scotland and considers that it will greatly improve commuter services, and opposes North Lanarkshire Council’s decision to introduce charges for using this as being counterproductive to encouraging people out of the car and on the train.

S3M-8070 Jamie Hepburn: Croy Railway Station—That the Parliament welcomes the official opening of the new park-and-ride facility at Croy railway station by the Minister for Transport and Infrastructure, Keith Brown, on Wednesday 23 February 2011; acknowledges that the facility is the biggest of its kind in Scotland and considers that it will greatly improve commuter services, and opposes North Lanarkshire Council’s decision to introduce charges for using this as being counterproductive to encouraging people out of the car and on the train.
